elements glossentry glossentry Element
glossentry &glossentry.purpose;
&glossentry.synopsis.gen; Description
GlossEntry is a wrapper around a glossary term and its definition.
Processing expectations
&format.block; Glossary entries are usually formatted to highlight the terms and definitions, frequently in a style similar to VarListEntrys.
&glossentry.parents.gen; &glossentry.children.gen;
Attributes
sortas
SortAs specifies the string by which the element's content is to be sorted. If unspecified, the proper content is used.
Examples
For examples, see &glossentry.example.seealso.gen;.
